original_text: But we do not want to say that only men gave John his authority. Then all the people would throw stones at us to kill us. They are sure that John really was a prophet from God.’
korean_text: 만일 사람으로부터라 하면 백성이 요한을 선지자로 인정하니 그들이 다 우리를 돌로 칠 것이라 하고

sentences.original_text: But we do not want to say
that only men gave John his authority
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 사람들만이 요한에게 권위를 주었다는 것을

sentences.original_text: Then all the people would throw stones at us
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 모든 백성이 우리에게 돌을 던질 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that John really was a prophet from God
sentences.korean_translation: 요한이 정말로 하나님으로부터 온 선지자였다는 것을
